author: Special Correspondent
text: Southern Railway will operate a superfast special train from Ernakulam to Howrah via Coimbatore, Katpadi, and Renigunta. Train No. 02854 Ernakulam – Howrah Suvidha superfast special train will leave Ernakulam at 08.50 hrs on January 26 and reach Howrah at 23.00 hrs the next day. The train will have a coach composition of one AC 2-tier, four AC 3-tier, 12 sleeper class and two luggage-cum-brake van. The train will have stoppages at Aluva, Thrissur, Palakkad, Coimbatore, Erode, Jolarpettai, Katpadi, Renigunta, Nellore, Ongole, Vijayawada, Eluru, Rajahmundry, Visakhapatnam, Brahmapur, Khurda Road, Bhubaneswar, Cuttack, Bhadrak and Kharagpur.
title: Special train to Howrah from Ernakulam
